lines.text: I'll swap you my role for yours.

Yeah, sure. Of course. I overcame a degree in engineering, I get a fuckin' great job at Oklahoma, and now I give you my character, so that you can perhaps clean your ass with it. So, don't bugger, man, don't bugger.
No, son, course not, course not.
But, don't you like the motorbike I bought you?

Yes, the bike is great, but that's a completely different thing. Don't you remember what I told you in the letters? I told you, "I'm eager to see you both when I get back". You both, I told you, mother and you. And then I come back and, you've killed her. Why did you kill her?
It's hard to tell this a son, but your mother was very bad. I've waited for you to be raised, and for you to have a good job. But now you have that post at Oklahoma, why do you want a mother?
I don't know but, as I'm beginning a sabbatical year with nothing to do...
But you're raiding a bike because of that. A bike with a sidecar, so you can see world. Because, you see, all the fucking day there at Oklahoma.
Do you think that any knowledge we can get now at school, will be of a rank lesser to the spiritual assets we had been provided at church?
